page.title: 10HEALTH IN CALLANDER
page.content: {Doctors-}There are two surgeries,each staffed by two doctors.They have morning and evening surgeries.Each surgery treats about 150 patients a week.The most common ailments are upper respiratory infections. {Dentists-}There are dental surgeries with appointment systems in operation Of the 150 patients seen per week,most have checkups and fillings. {Ambulance-}There is one ambulance and 2 ambulance men based in callander. Outpatients and emergency cases are taken to Stirling Royal Infirmary. In the {Health clinic}the health visitor are interested in preventative medicine.The community health nurse tends to the acutely sick in their own homes,so that they do not have to go to hospital.A fourth nurse tends to the sick,elderly and disabled in their own homes.There are two Nursing Homes.
